LemonStand.com | Vancouver, Canada | Full time | ONSITE | Dev/Ops

We're looking for someone amazing to lead DevOps at LemonStand.

The position requires ~ 5 years of experience in large-scale web application development. Salary is be based on experience, and will include a generous portion of equity. If you're curious: we use AWS, OpsWorks, Ruby, Python, MySQL (and so on), but we believe any great web/ops developer will know these anyway.

More details here: http://betakit.com/job/devops-lead/
